DRAFT.description: Boolean value for preview of final version. Do not save in final invoice.

INVOICE_NUMBER.description: Unique serial number of the invoice. The format of the invoice number has to be constant for at least one year.

INVOICE_DATE.description: The date at which the invoice was issued.

INVOICE_DUE_DATE.description: The due date of the invoice. Has to be INVOICE_DATE + INVOICE_DUE_TERM

INVOICE_DUE_TERM.description: The due term of the invoice. It can be fixed terms or free value. For fixed terms the INVOICE_DUE_DATE is computed automatically, for the free value the user selects a due date value

INVOICE_DETAILS.description: Invoice general instructions and details for payment.

VAT.description: The VAT value according to each EU country. Must be selected from a list

EXCHANGE_RATE.description: The exchange rate if the invoice value has to be converted to anothe currency.

INVOICE_LINE.description: Each invidual line on the invioce.

INVOICE_SUM.description: The total sum of the invoice lines without taxes.

INVOICE_TVA_SUM.description: The total sum of the invoice lines for taxes.

INVOICE_TOTAL.description: The total sum of the invoice lines with taxes.
